name: BuckyDrop – 1688 Dropshipping for WooCommerce
author: BuckyDrop

sections.description:
BuckyDrop – One-Stop Dropshipping Expert for Chinese E-commerce Marketplaces. Choose products from Chinese marketplaces as your source of goods and 1-click sync them with your WooCommerce store. Plus, managing your online business is easier than ever before with our order auto-fulfillment capabilities!
BuckyDrop provides one-stop whole-process e-commerce services to help you each step of the way: procurement, value-added services, payment & settlement, warehousing management, international logistics, after-sales service, and so much more! We are committed to creating a one-stop comprehensive e-commerce solution with which you can focus on your advantages and business development to stand out from the fierce competition with differentiation strategies and unique products.

Advantages:

  • Connect with WooCommerce in 5 Minutes
    With just a few steps to install the BuckyDrop plugin, your WooCommerce store orders will be quickly connected to BuckyDrop for auto-fulfillment, saving the hassle of manual processing while boosting operation efficiency.

  • Source from Various Chinese E-commerce Marketplaces
    BuckyDrop supports purchasing items from various marketplaces (Ali Dropshipping, 1688 Dropshipping, Taobao Dropshipping, Pinduoduo Dropshipping, Yupoo Dropshipping, Xianyu Dropshipping, Weidian Dropshipping, Poizon Dropshipping, etc.) and then 1-click syncing them to your WooCommerce store. Leverage the extensive and diverse selection of Chinese goods and competitive prices, along with guaranteed delivery times and quality checks made possible by our professional procurement team to ensure high-quality products at the lowest cost.

  • Plethora of Customized Services
    Create your personalized brand with BuckyDrop’s 100+ customized services. From label processing and customized packaging to photos-based quality checks and more, we’ve got you covered!

  • Diversified International Shipping Lines
    With years of experience in international logistics, BuckyDrop takes pride in providing steady and reliable global delivery services. Whatever the product category and the destination, top-rated shipping lines are available to suit you best. Plus, our shipping experts can provide shipping solutions tailored to your unique needs.

  • 1-on-1 Butler-Style Customer Service
    Enjoy top-notch one-on-one services from the exclusive Customer Service specialist assigned by BuckyDrop. Any questions or need a hand? Our VIP Customer Service Team is always ready to help you out.

Learn More

  • Official Website:
    https://www.buckydrop.com/
  • Help Center:
    https://www.buckydrop.com/en/help/
  • Contact Us:
    support@buckydrop.com
sections.installation:
From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘BuckyDrop’
  3. Activate BuckyDrop from your Plugins page.
  4. Go to “after activation” below.

Manually

  1. Upload the BuckyDrop folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the BuckyDrop plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “after activation” below.
